bonus.value: Increase damage dealt to grievous targets by 12%/15%/18%.

mind.name: Diverse
mind.desc: What to do when you think about it and it spreads?

memory.name: Dissipation
memory.desc: From disorderly to orderly? Outside interference is probably needed. Probably, I said.

belief.name: Fair Trade
belief.desc: Goods should be traded according to their own value. But how do you put a value on something that's immeasurable?

emotion.name: Nth Power
emotion.desc: If only experience gained and ROI worked exponentially...
